Uses of Class
com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasource.DataSource

  • Packages that use DataSource 
    Package Description
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.application
    Support for applications in VisualVM.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.application.snapshot
    Support for application snapshots in VisualVM.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasource
    Definition of DataSource and related core APIs.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasource.descriptor
    Definition of DataSourceDescriptor and related core APIs.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasupport
    Various helper methods and interfaces for manipulations with DataSources.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.explorer
    APIs for accessing explorer tree (Applications tree).
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.model
    This package provides generic support for attaching Model to DataSource.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.properties
    Support for user-customizable properties for DataSources.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.snapshot
    APIs for snapshots in VisualVM.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui
    APIs for VisualVM UI.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.actions
    APIs for UI actions in VisualVM.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.coredump
    Support for core dumps in VisualVM.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.heapdump
    Support for heap dumps in VisualVM.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.host
    Support for hosts in VisualVM.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.threaddump
    Support for thread dumps in VisualVM.
    com.sun.tools.visualvm.tools.sa
    Serviceability Agent support in VisualVM.

      This is abstact factory class for getting model for datasource.
      interface  ModelProvider<M extends Model,B extends DataSource>
      This interface should be implemented if you want to extend ModelFactory with your own provider.

    • Uses of DataSource in com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.actions

      Classes in com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.actions with type parameters of type DataSource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DataSourceAction<X extends DataSource>
      Abstract Action which can be used as a basis for any DataSource-aware action.
      class  MultiDataSourceAction<X extends DataSource>
      Abstract DataSourceAction which can be used as a basis for any action available (enabled) just for one or more selected DataSources in Applications window..
      class  SingleDataSourceAction<X extends DataSource>
      Abstract DataSourceAction which can be used as a basis for any action available (enabled) just for single selected DataSource in Applications window..
      Methods in com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.actions with type parameters of type DataSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <X extends DataSource> 
      X      		 ActionUtils.getSelectedDataSource(Class<X> scope)
      Returns selected DataSource is exactly one DataSource of a certain type is selected in Applications window, null otherwise.
      static <X extends DataSource> 
      Set<X>      		 ActionUtils.getSelectedDataSources(Class<X> scope)
      Returns Set of selected DataSources of a certain type in Applications window or empty Set if no DataSource of this type is selected.
